mapper.insert: insert into t_performance_responsibility_detail (id, responsibility_id, insure_premium, car_insure_premium, acc_insure_premium, hea_insure_premium, prop_insure_premium, month_step, quarter_step, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{responsibilityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insurePremium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carInsurePremium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accInsurePremium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{heaInsurePremium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{propInsurePremium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{monthStep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quarterStep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
